item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Water does not resist. Water flows. When you plunge your hand into it, all you feel is a caress. Water is not a solid wall, it will not stop you. But water always goes where it wants to go, and nothing in the end can stand against it. Water is patient. Dripping water wears away a stone. Remember that, my child. Remember you are half water. If you can't go through an obstacle, go around it. Water does." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Cleverness is a quality a man likes to have in his wife as long as she is some distance away from him. Up close, he'll take kindness any day of the week, if there's nothing more alluring to be had." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "I can't bear to hear a human being spoken of with contempt just because of his group identification...It's these respectable people here who create those hooligans out there." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The truth is rarely pure and never simple." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I never travel without my diary. One should always have something sensational to read in the train." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I never change, except in my affections." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Luis Sepúlveda
item.description: "He often heard that wisdom comes with age, and he waited, trusting that this wisdom would bring him what he most wanted; that ability to guide his memories and not fall into the traps that they often set for him." -- Luis Sepúlveda

item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "It all depends on what sum is sufficient to break a man. A question of relativity, is it not so?" -- Anonymous

item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Never worry about what you say to a man. They're so conceited that they never believe you mean it if it's unflattering." -- Anonymous

item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "All love serenades must come to an end." -- Anonymous

item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "I’d say where thinking ends, stupidity begins." -- Anonymous

item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "On the first day Coraline's family moved in, Miss Spink and Miss Forcible made a point of telling Coraline how dangerous the well was, and they warned her to be sure she kept away from it. So Coraline set off to explore for it, so that she knew where it was, to keep away from it properly." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "It is astonishing just how much of what we are can be tied to the beds we wake up in in the morning, and it is astonishing how fragile that can be." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Emanuela add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "What kind of fun would it be if I just got everything I ever wanted?" -- Anonymous
